General.Name: Mg Internation
General.Description: MG International S.A. engages in the production and sale of public or private swimming pool equipment. It offers cleaning robots, pool covers, swimming pool alarms, pool cleaning, and swimming pool safety products under the Precisio, Aquaarm, Sensor Premium, and Sensor Spy brands. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in La Ciotat, France. MG International S.A. is a subsidiary of Maytronics Ltd.
General.Address: 163, Avenue des Tamaris, La Ciotat, France, 13705
